formElement.label: Server configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Supply the configuration name of the JBoss server. This configuration will hold information about the standalone server you want to start. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Supply the configuration name of the JBoss server. This configuration will hold information about the standalone server you want to start.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Physical location of the standalone script:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path of the standalone script, i.e: 'standalone.bat', '/usr/tools/bin/standalone.sh', 'c:/Program Files/JBoss/bin/standalone.bat'. (Required)

formElement.label: Optional configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the XML config file if you want to start your server with a different configuration.
